item.title: Milos Djeric
item.description: Personal website, with projects, of a sociologist who is passionate about research and data science.

item.description: Personal website, with projects, of a sociologist who is passionate about research and data science.

item.title: Curriculum vitae
item.description: Milos Djeric: detailed CV and short resume. Sociology, data science, and research.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Milos Djeric: short overview of recent research and data analysis projects.

item.title: GPSC Survey
item.description: Description of the 2017/2018 survey of graduate and professional students at SIU.

item.title: American Nationalism and the Curse of Rurality
item.description: Summary of MA paper: American Nationalism and the Curse of Rurality: Urban-Rural Differences and the Notion of National Belonging. Author: Milos Djeric.

item.title: Ex-YU Diaspora
item.description: Exploring languge identification among diasporas from former Yugoslavi in the US.

item.title: Belgrade Nikola Tesla airport
item.description: Data analysis demonstration using the case of Belgrade Airport.

item.title: Reproducing Data for Airport Nis
item.description: Data analysis demonstration using the case of Airport Nis.

item.title: Functions
item.description: Overview of somewhat useful R functions.

item.title: Improving regression ceofficient plots
item.description: R function that improves complex regression coefficient or AMA plots when using ggplot2. Author: Milos Djeric

item.title: Recoding GSS religion
item.description: R function that recodes GSS religion from three variables to 12 categories, according to paper by Darren E. Sherkat and Derek Lehman. Auhtor: Milos Djeric

item.title: Mean on at least
item.description: Simple R function to simulate SPSS mean on at least. Author: Milos Djeric.

item.title: Scaling thousands and millions
item.description: Super simple R function for use in ggplot2 for scaling axis and transforming #000000 to #M and #000 to #K.
